name: Acrobatic
text: Lose a card to negate 5 or more damage.

name: Aggressor
text: Have one or more monsters present on the map at the beginning of every round during the scenario.

name: Ambusher
text: Open a door and end your move action adjacent to a monster in the revealed room.

name: Assassin
text: Kill a monster before it takes any actions in the scenario.

name: Assistant
text: Kill a monster attacked by an ally earlier in the round.

name: Bastion
text: Be adjacent to at least two monsters while standing on a door hex.

name: Bully
text: Kill a monster afflicted by a negative condition.

name: Contagious
text: While afflicted by a negative condition, apply any negative condition to a monster.

name: Covetous
text: Never collect a money token from end-of-turn looting.

name: Cuddler
text: Take a rest only on rounds in which an ally is also taking a long or short rest.

name: Diehard
text: Never allow your current hit point value to drop below half your maximum hit point value (rounded up) during the scenario.

name: Discriminating
text: Kill no elite monsters or bosses during the scenario.

name: Distracted
text: Kill a monster you are not adjacent to while adjacent to another monster.

name: Drowsy
text: Declare a long rest while at your maximum hit point value.

name: Dynamo
text: Kill a monster during the scenario by causing at least 4 more points of damage to it than is necessary.

name: Elitist
text: Kill only elite monsters.

name: Executioner
text: Kill an undamaged monster with a single attack during the scenario.

name: Explorer
text: Reveal a room tile by opening a door on your turn during the scenario.

name: Exterminator
text: Kill three monsters in the same round.

name: Fast Healer
text: Your current hit point value must be equal to your maximum hit point value at the end of the scenario.

name: Fearful
text: Never end your turn adjacent to a monster.

name: Feeble
text: Be the first player to become exhausted.

name: Feral
text: Have the most cards in your lost pile at the end of the scenario.

name: Finisher
text: Kill the last monster to die in the scenario.

name: Hesitant
text: Never go first in a round's initiative.

name: Hoarder
text: Loot five or more money tokens during the scenario.

name: Hothead
text: Add two cards to your lost pile before your first rest.

name: Hunter
text: Kill one or more elite monsters during the scenario.

name: Indigent
text: Loot no money tokens or treasure overlay tiles during the scenario.

name: Instigator
text: Except when long resting, never go last in a round's initiative.

name: Insulting
text: Apply another negative condition to a monster already afflicted by one.

name: Layabout
text: Gain 7 or fewer experience points during the scenario.

name: Limping
text: Move using only basic move actions.

name: Lucky
text: Kill a monster with an attack with disadvantage.

name: Marksman
text: Kill a monster three or more hexes away from you.

name: Masochist
text: Your current hit point value must be equal to or less than 2 at the end of the scenario.

name: Miser
text: Never exit a room while money tokens remain in it.

name: Mugger
text: Kill a monster and loot its money token on the same turn.

name: Multitasker
text: Kill a monster and open a door on the same round.

name: Neutralizer
text: Cause a trap to be sprung or disarmed on your turn or on the turn of one of your summons during the scenario.

name: Opener
text: Be the first to kill a monster during the scenario.

name: Pacifist
text: Kill three or fewer monsters during the scenario.

name: Paranoid
text: End each of your turns adjacent to a wall or obstacle.

name: Peacemonger
text: Never deal the killing blow to a monster.

name: Perforated
text: Lose 6 or more hit points in a single round.

name: Pickpocket
text: Perform a loot action while adjacent to at least two monsters.

name: Pincushion
text: Get attacked by three or more monsters in the same round.

name: Plunderer
text: Loot a treasure overlay tile during the scenario.

name: Professional
text: Use your equipped items a number of times equal to or greater than your level plus 2 during the scenario.

name: Prosperous
text: Collect three or more money tokens in the same turn.

name: Protector
text: Allow none of your character allies to become exhausted during the scenario.

name: Purist
text: Use no items during the scenario.

name: Ravager
text: Play two cards for their lost actions on the same turn.

name: Recluse
text: Never end your turn adjacent to an ally.

name: Reserved
text: Have the fewest cards in your lost pile at the end of the scenario.

name: Restless
text: Move at least one hex on each of your turns (except when long resting).

name: Retaliator
text: Don't make any attacks in the scenario until after you've taken damage for the first time.

name: Ritualistic
text: Kill a monster when two or more elements are strong or waning.

name: Sadist
text: Kill five or more monsters during the scenario.

name: Scavenger
text: Collect more money tokens than any other player.

name: Scrambler
text: Take only short rests during the scenario.

name: Shadow
text: End each of your turns adjacent to an ally.

name: Sharpshooter
text: Kill a monster in a different room (neither of you may be on a doorway tile).

name: Slayer
text: Kill two monsters in the same round.

name: Sleepless
text: Take damage during the same round you take a long rest.

name: Sober
text: Use no potions during the scenario.

name: Sociable
text: Never leave a room with a character ally remaining in it.

name: Specialized
text: Don't use any basic actions.

name: Stalwart
text: Never leave a hex adjacent to a monster.

name: Straggler
text: Take only long rests during the scenario.

name: Streamliner
text: Have five or more total cards in your hand and discard at the end of the scenario.

name: Stubborn
text: Do not lose any cards to negate damage during the scenario.

name: Thorough
text: Never exit a room with monsters remaining in it.

name: Untouchable
text: Take no damage.

name: Wasteful
text: Lose a card to negate 2 or less damage from an attack.

name: Winded
text: Never have fewer than one card in your hand.

name: Workhorse
text: Gain 13 or more experience points during the scenario.

name: Zealot
text: Have three or fewer total cards in your hand and discard at the end of the scenario.
